BackstoryDef.title: former athlete
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a former athlete. [PAWN_pronoun] had won multiple sports championships before injury.[PAWN_pronoun] had a twin brother who started working in a chemical factory during his youth, but has never heard from him since.

BackstoryDef.title: fashion guy
BackstoryDef.description: After being injured,[PAWN_nameDef] was no longer able to continue [PAWN_pronoun] career as an athlete. Disappointed, [PAWN_pronoun] was hired as a security guard by a shopping mall. This fashionable guy liked to patrol the mall at night in his classic black striped sportswear and use a machine gun to knock out every sneaky thief.

BackstoryDef.title: chemical plant intern
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an intern at a chemical plant, tasked with handling certain chemical agents and learning to operate the factory equipment. [PAWN_pronoun] learns rapidly and occasionally assists workers in treating injuries sustained while on the job.[PAWN_pronoun] also enjoys drawing in his spare time.

BackstoryDef.title: failed subjects
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] inhaled a large amount of toxic gas during a chemical plant accident .[PAWN_possessive] twin brother sent [PAWN_pronoun] to the hospital affiliated with the chemical plant to save [PAWN_pronoun], but the hospital did not treat [PAWN_nameDef]. Instead, they lied to [PAWN_possessive] family that [PAWN_pronoun] had died and used [PAWN_nameDef] as an experimental subject in a parasite experiment. This failed experiment destroyed [PAWN_possessive] mind.

BackstoryDef.title: laboratory kid
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was conceived in a test tube in a secret laboratory, where every child underwent military-style education and was frequently administered drugs. There, [PAWN_nameDef] acquired a great deal of knowledge.

BackstoryDef.title: Special units
BackstoryDef.description: Following a specialized "consensual" parasite experiment, [PAWN_nameDef] was enhanced and designated as a unique unit, frequently undertaking covert missions.

BackstoryDef.title: disaster orphans
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lost [PAWN_possessive] parents in the insect infestation and lived alone in an underground network of caves. [PAWN_pronoun] often went hungry until one day [PAWN_pronoun] discovered the back door of a secret laboratory warehouse. [PAWN_pronoun] broke in and stole the food inside, but was caught on [PAWN_possessive] second attempt.

BackstoryDef.title: researcher's child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was a researcher at an ancient laboratory, with an unnatural fondness for experimentation. Consequently, [PAWN_nameDef] was frequently administered unauthorized drugs, inflicting severe pain upon [PAWN_nameDef].

BackstoryDef.title: runaway child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was frequently mistreated by [PAWN_possessive] parents, leading [PAWN_pronoun] to leave home in a fit of rage. Tragically, [PAWN_pronoun] was soon kidnapped by individuals and spirited away to a covert laboratory.

BackstoryDef.title: rising star of the military academy
BackstoryDef.titleFemale: rising star of the military academy
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a rising star in the military academy with excellent physical fitness and combat skills, which led to [PAWN_pronoun] being kidnapped and sent to a secret laboratory, where a clone was sent to [PAWN_possessive] family as a substitute.
